HomePage.greeting: Customers will hand you their money once we build your website.
HomePage.MOTIVATION: My journey into web development began with my siblings, who encouraged me to explore a career in tech. Initially, i found it difficult because i wasn't sure how to break into the field, but i was determined to learn code eventually. Watching movies, I always admired the idea of 'the laptop and the hoodie'.This newfound interest led me to expirement with HTML and CSS, spending my secondary school days building frontend websites. Through trial and error, I realized this career path would be most fufilling.
HomePage.ctaTitle: Are you impressed by my work? Let's talk
HomePage.ctaDescription: I would love nothing more than to hear about your project and how i can be of service.

Features.firstDescription: If after building your website you are not 100% satisfied with our work within 7 days, your money will be refunded in full.
Features.secondDescription: Once you build a website with us you get a free hamper or Gift basket as a token of our appreciation.
Features.thirdDescription: After building your first website with us, you get a 20% discount on your next project.
Features.fourthDescription: You get a free MR Eseosa Jotter on any website you build with us and for any plan you go with.
